topics.question:
Describe a memorable journey or trip you have taken. You should say:
• where you went
• who you went with
• what you did there
and explain why this journey was memorable for you.

topics.topic: a person who has influenced you
topics.question:
Describe a person who has influenced you in your life. You should say:
• who this person is
• how you know them
• what they are like
and explain how they have influenced you.

topics.topic: a skill you would like to learn
topics.question:
Describe a skill you would like to learn. You should say:
• what the skill is
• why you want to learn it
• how you would learn it
and explain how this skill would help you in your life.

topics.topic: a book or movie you enjoyed
topics.question:
Describe a book or movie you really enjoyed. You should say:
• what it was about
• when you read/watched it
• why you chose it
and explain why you enjoyed it so much.

topics.topic: a place you would like to visit
topics.question:
Describe a place you would like to visit in the future. You should say:
• where this place is
• what you know about it
• what you would do there
and explain why you want to visit this place.

Describe an important decision you made in your life. You should say:
• what the decision was
• when you made it
• what factors influenced your decision
and explain why this decision was important to you.

Describe a celebration or festival that is important in your culture. You should say:
• what the celebration is
• when it takes place
• how people celebrate it
and explain why this celebration is important to you.

topics.topic: a piece of technology you use
topics.question:
Describe a piece of technology you use regularly. You should say:
• what it is
• how often you use it
• what you use it for
and explain how this technology has made your life easier.

Describe a happy memory from your childhood. You should say:
• what happened
• where you were
• who was with you
and explain why this memory is special to you.

topics.topic: a goal you want to achieve
topics.question:
Describe a goal you want to achieve in the future. You should say:
• what the goal is
• why it's important to you
• what steps you need to take
and explain how achieving this goal would change your life.
